de.samdev.absgdx.framework.entities.colliosiondetection.geometries

Class CollisionTriangle

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.samdev.absgdx.framework.entities.colliosiondetection.geometries.CollisionGeometry
      • de.samdev.absgdx.framework.entities.colliosiondetection.geometries.CollisionTriangle

  • public class CollisionTriangle
extends CollisionGeometry
    A Collision Geometry in the shape of a triangle

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      float centroidCorrection_x
      This is the x-value the initial points (in the constructor) got corrected

      This is the y-value the initial points (in the constructor) got corrected

      The circumRadius of the triangle

      The triangle point1.x (points are CounterClockWise)

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      CollisionTriangle(CollisionGeometryOwner owner, float p1x, float p1y, float p2x, float p2y, float p3x, float p3y)
      Creates a new Triangle The vertices will be made relative to their centroid (!) they will use every translation they have
      CollisionTriangle(CollisionGeometryOwner owner, com.badlogic.gdx.math.Vector2 p1, com.badlogic.gdx.math.Vector2 p2, com.badlogic.gdx.math.Vector2 p3)
      Creates a new Triangle The vertices will be made relative to their circumCenter (!) they will use every translation they have

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Calculates and returns the area of the geometry

      float getRadius()
      The surrounding radius of this geometry
      float getXTouchDistance(CollisionBox other)
      Get the X-distance that this geometries and another can minimally have -> the other one is a CollisionBox (at this distance they don't intersect but touch) [!] The distance gets ShapeMath.FDELTA added so the no-intersection ruled is enforced
      float getXTouchDistance(CollisionCircle other)
      Get the X-distance that this geometries and another can minimally have -> the other one is a CollisionCircle (at this distance they don't intersect but touch) [!] The distance gets ShapeMath.FDELTA added so the no-intersection ruled is enforced
      float getXTouchDistance(CollisionTriangle other)
      Get the X-distance that this geometries and another can minimally have -> the other one is a CollisionTriangle (at this distance they don't intersect but touch) [!] The distance gets ShapeMath.FDELTA added so the no-intersection ruled is enforced
      float getYTouchDistance(CollisionBox other)
      Get the Y-distance that this geometries and another can minimally have -> the other one is a CollisionBox (at this distance they don't intersect but touch) [!] The distance gets ShapeMath.FDELTA added so the no-intersection ruled is enforced
      float getYTouchDistance(CollisionCircle other)
      Get the Y-distance that this geometries and another can minimally have -> the other one is a CollisionCircle (at this distance they don't intersect but touch) [!] The distance gets ShapeMath.FDELTA added so the no-intersection ruled is enforced
      float getYTouchDistance(CollisionTriangle other)
      Get the Y-distance that this geometries and another can minimally have -> the other one is a CollisionTriangle (at this distance they don't intersect but touch) [!] The distance gets ShapeMath.FDELTA added so the no-intersection ruled is enforced
      boolean isIntersectingWith(CollisionBox other)
      Returns if this geometry and another (a box) are intersecting each other
      boolean isIntersectingWith(CollisionCircle other)
      Returns if this geometry and another (a circle) are intersecting each other
      boolean isIntersectingWith(CollisionTriangle other)
      Returns if this geometry and another (a triangle) are intersecting each other

    • Constructor Detail

      • CollisionTriangle

        public CollisionTriangle(CollisionGeometryOwner owner,
                 float p1x,
                 float p1y,
                 float p2x,
                 float p2y,
                 float p3x,
                 float p3y)
        Creates a new Triangle The vertices will be made relative to their centroid (!) they will use every translation they have
        Parameters:
        owner - the Entity that owns this geometry
        p1x - the first point (X)
        p1y - the first point (Y)
        p2x - the second point (X)
        p2y - the second point (Y)
        p3x - the third point (X)
        p3y - the third point (Y)
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the 3 vertices lie in a line

      • CollisionTriangle

        public CollisionTriangle(CollisionGeometryOwner owner,
                 com.badlogic.gdx.math.Vector2 p1,
                 com.badlogic.gdx.math.Vector2 p2,
                 com.badlogic.gdx.math.Vector2 p3)
        Creates a new Triangle The vertices will be made relative to their circumCenter (!) they will use every translation they have
        Parameters:
        owner - the Entity that owns this geometry
        p1 - the first point
        p2 - the second point
        p3 - the third point
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the 3 vertices lie in a line

        public float getXTouchDistance(CollisionBox other)
        Description copied from class: CollisionGeometry
        Get the X-distance that this geometries and another can minimally have -> the other one is a CollisionBox (at this distance they don't intersect but touch) [!] The distance gets ShapeMath.FDELTA added so the no-intersection ruled is enforced
        Specified by:
        getXTouchDistance in class CollisionGeometry
        Parameters:
        other - the other geometry
        Returns:
        the minimal x distance
